mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_order od INNER JOIN tb_clnt cl ON od.clnt_no = cl.clnt_no INNER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON od.loginID = ui.loginID

SELECT od.order_no ,DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS order_date ,cl.clnt_no ,cl.clnt_name ,cl.clnt_tel ,cl.clnt_email ,cl.clnt_zip ,cl.clnt_add ,cl.clnt_add_dt ,ui.name ,od.order_tot_price ,od.order_req FROM tb_order od INNER JOIN tb_clnt cl ON od.clnt_no = cl.clnt_no INNER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON od.loginID = ui.loginID WHERE od.order_no = #{order_no};

SELECT ot.order_no ,cl.clnt_name ,pd.product_no ,pd.product_name ,pd.product_price ,ot.order_dt_amt ,ot.order_dt_price FROM tb_order_dt ot INNER JOIN tb_clnt cl ON ot.clnt_no = cl.clnt_no INNER JOIN tb_product pd ON ot.product_no = pd.product_no WHERE ot.order_no = #{order_no};
